price: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not obey any sinner or disbeliever from among them.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
